snippet.title: SPHAZE: launch trailer - Android/iOS
snippet.description:
SPHAZE: launch trailer - Android/iOS

SPHAZE is available now over on the App Store and Google Play. It's a premium game that currently costs $2.99 for iOS during its first week of release, and will cost $4.99 thereafter.


SPHAZE is a relaxing exploration through fantasy and sci-fi worlds. Guide the mysterious robots through different areas, solving arcade puzzles, challenging your reflex, and helping the energetic RoBeep.

BEAUTIFUL
Inspired by minimalist 3D design, real-life environments mixed with fantasy and sci-fi ideas. Each area is unique, hand-crafted world to explore.

EASY TO USE
Twist and drag to solve every puzzle. Designed to be easy for everyone to pick up, enjoy, and complete. And if you still have problems, the game will offer a way to help you!

SOUND
Crafted originally by Celfie to guide you through different worlds. Best experienced with headphones.

Game created by DynamicTrio - creators of Dying Light 2, The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt and Cyberpunk 2077. Published by SUBPIXELS - creator of Puzzle Craft 2, Full of Stars and Real Boxing. 


App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1397180033
Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=pl.subpixels.sphaze

---------------------------------------------------------------
Contact : verinfar.contact@gmail.com

Subscribe so you don't miss the latest Android/iOS games trailer!
